templates.title: Install Tutorial Datasources
templates.description: A reusable template that guides users through installing Grafana Cloud's test datasources (Prometheus, Loki, Tempo, and Pyroscope) and demonstrates how to select them in various areas of the product.

snippets.title: Navigation Menu Item Click
snippets.description: A single block snippet for clicking items in the left navigation menu. Requires navmenu-open.

snippets.title: Data Source Picker
snippets.description: A single block snippet for selecting a datasource using the standard data source picker input.

snippets.title: Run Query Button
snippets.description: A single block snippet for clicking the Run query button in Explore and query editors.

snippets.title: Code Mode Toggle
snippets.description: A single block snippet for switching to Code mode in query editors (Prometheus, Loki, SQL, etc.).

snippets.title: Query Textarea Formfill
snippets.description: A single block snippet for entering queries into the code editor textarea.

snippets.title: Multistep: Save Dashboard
snippets.description: A multistep snippet for saving a dashboard: click Save Dashboard, enter name, click Save.

snippets.title: Multistep: Datasource Picker
snippets.description: A multistep snippet for selecting a datasource: click picker, then select the datasource.

snippets.title: Guided: Hover to Reveal and Click
snippets.description: A guided snippet for hover-to-reveal interactions: hover over an item to reveal buttons, then click.

snippets.title: Logs Drilldown Tab Navigation
snippets.description: Selectors for Labels, Fields, Patterns, and Logs tabs in Logs Drilldown.

snippets.title: Navigate to Logs Drilldown
snippets.description: A multistep snippet for navigating to Drilldown > Logs from the main menu.

snippets.title: Log Volume Panel Menu
snippets.description: Selector for the Log volume panel menu using wildcard to handle dynamic log counts.

snippets.title: Time Picker
snippets.description: Global time picker button selector, works across Explore, dashboards, and drilldown apps.

snippets.title: Navigate to Traces Drilldown
snippets.description: A multistep snippet for navigating to Drilldown > Traces from the main menu.

snippets.title: Traces Drilldown Tabs
snippets.description: Selectors for tabs in Traces Drilldown (e.g., Slow traces).

snippets.title: Expand/Collapse Arrow Icon
snippets.description: A single block snippet for clicking expand/collapse arrow icons.

snippets.title: Tab Button Pattern
snippets.description: A pattern snippet for clicking tabs using data-testid selectors.
